name: mri_compute_bias
description: Compute bias correction volumes for the given subjects and outputs the result to a specified volume.

inputs.description: List of subjects for which bias correction is calculated.
inputs.name: Subjects

inputs.description: Output volume where the result will be stored.
inputs.name: Output Volume

output-files.description: The output volume containing the bias correction result.
output-files.name: Output File

author: FreeSurfer Developers
